name: HOOR ATTAR
description: Hoor is a telchem musky fragrance for men and women, its is one of the most selling attar till right now in our collection in this price range.

name: MUSK R GOLD ATTAR
description: Light musky unisex attar.
The best attar of all time for men and women.
Lasting: 6-8 Hours depends upon how you apply and how much you apply and many other factor.

name: MUKHALLATH JUNAID ATTAR
description: In search of glorious essence like a mermaid? We present you, "Mukhallath Junaid". Feel the rich fragrance "Mukhallath Junaid" from the house of Junaid Al-Atoor.
This fascinating and sophisticated fragrance is best suited for both men and women.
Comes in an elegantly designed bottle, the amorous blend brings top notes of Oudh Rose, complemented by a captivating heart of musky rose, and a delightful mellow sandalwood base.

name: FRUIT BOMB ATTAR 12ML
description: Fruit Bomb by Junaid Al Atoor is a unisex fruit fragrance for men and women.
This is not common fruity fragrance it changes with time.
You will surely get the compliment people like to much you should also trey this beautiful fragrance.

name: MUKHALLATH F ATTAR
description: Mukhallath F is a unisex Rose base mukhallath mixture, having a lasting of 8hrs approx with a arabic fragrance.

name: ROUGE ATTAR
description: Rouge by Junaid Al Atoor
Inspired by BR 540
Having  fruity and arabic fragrance.

name: OMAN ATTAR
description: Anyone who visited Haram (Makkah and Medinah), and is looking to cherish the unforgettable memories with the help of fragrance?
If yes, then we have an Arabic attar "OMAN" for you to relive those moments!!
And one more thing dont assume or expect in Saudi Arabia they apply this attar on Kaaba ðŸ•‹ or feel the similar fragrance.
Oman fragrance is similar to the fragrance when we walk near by area of haram they used to burn bakhoor and all and you will recall the memory in this Oman Attar.
Arabic bakhur incense wali fragrance hai isme.
If you dont like either you can return or exchange.

name: OUDH SAUDI ATTAR
description: Oudh saudi is rose oudh honey oriental fragrance for men.
